sentences.en: 100 workers are facing the axe in a cost-cutting exercise.
sentences.cn: 在削减成本的运作中，100名工人面临解雇。

sentences.en: And so do I. I heard the fall of the axe in that sound.
sentences.cn: 我也怀疑。我在那一片喧嚣之中听到了斧头落下的声音。

sentences.en: Be careful with that sharp axe.
sentences.cn: 那把斧子很锋利,你要当心.

sentences.en: Clang, clang goes the woodman's axe.
sentences.cn: 伐木丁丁.

sentences.en: He fell the tree with a dozen blows of his axe.
sentences.cn: 他十几斧头就把树砍倒了.

sentences.en: He had just hit her over the head with the blunt end of an axe, fracturing her skull in three places.
sentences.cn: 就在刚刚，他用斧子另一端猛敲了妮基的头一下，将她的颅骨敲断裂成了三块。

sentences.en: He looks like he's got an axe to grind. Better have a talk with him.
sentences.cn: 他看来是牢骚满腹, 你最好找他谈谈.

sentences.en: He maintained that he was protecting himself from Mr Cox, who came at him with an axe.
sentences.cn: 他坚持说当时考克斯先生拿着斧头向他冲过来，他是在自卫。

sentences.en: He swung the axe and with one blow split open the door.
sentences.cn: 他挥动着斧子一下就把门劈开了.

sentences.en: If all else fails, take all the unused hardware out to the back yard and go to town with a handy bat, golf club, machete, or axe.
sentences.cn: 如果一切都失败了，采取一切无用的硬件出到后院，去同一个方便的球棒，高尔夫球俱乐部，砍刀，斧头或到城里。

sentences.en: One of them chopped through the planks with her axe.
sentences.cn: 其中一人用她的斧头劈开了那些木板。

sentences.en: St Bartholomew's is one of four London hospitals facing the axe.
sentences.cn: 圣巴塞洛缪医院是伦敦4个面临关闭的医院之一。

sentences.en: The axe go to the wood where it borrow its helve.
sentences.cn: 斧头伐木不畏缩,尽管斧柄木头做.

sentences.en: The axe is too blunt to cut down the tree.
sentences.cn: 斧头太钝,砍不倒树.

sentences.en: The chancellor bluntly warned the Cabinet to axe public spending or face higher taxes.
sentences.cn: 大臣直接警告内阁要么大幅削减公共开支,要么加税.

sentences.en: The edge of this axe has turned.
sentences.cn: 这把斧子卷了刃了.

sentences.en: The traveler had to fight his way through the tropical forest with an axe.
sentences.cn: 探险者靠一把斧头奋力穿过热带雨林.

sentences.en: Then the woodcutter let his axe fly— Thwack! Everyone heard it.
sentences.cn: 然后那个伐木工脱手甩出了斧头。哐！每个人都听见了。

sentences.en: This stone axe is a relic of ancient times.
sentences.cn: 这石斧是古代的遗物.

sentences.en: Up to 300 workers are facing the axe at a struggling Merseyside firm.
sentences.cn: 艰苦挣扎的默西赛德公司有多达300名工人面临被解雇。

phrases.tran_cn: 另有所图；有不同意见；别有用心

trans.tran_en: a tool with a heavy metal blade on the end of a long handle, used to cut down trees or split pieces of wood
if someone gets the axe, they are dismissed from their job
